thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com
thread.title: RJ

author: RJ
title: RJ
text:
Ordred, then within 1 hour they added me on skype, and they offered a raid 3 days later, wich i agreed upon.
Logged in at agreed time, got invited 5-10min later, got summoned to the raid instance, and we killed all bosses as agreed upon. Got some personal loot, aswell as 2 items wich was traded to me after completing the raid.
Only good thing to say about the service. No wispers about me ordering, just straight forward, wich i like when doing services as this.
Can recommend this to anyone, and everyone. +++
